short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block the websites that steal your focus, and improve your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extensions that allows you to create a list of websites that should be blocked. The extension can fully block or prompt the user to continue whenever a website in the list is opened.
